english.segment1: Exchanging beauty. For the ashes. Given my heart. To nothing real. [X2]
english.segment2: I've given my heart away. To so many things. So many times I've failed. Help me stop this endless cycle. Remind me of how it can be
english.segment3: Take me back. I surrender all. Without you. My heart is broken
english.segment4: I never should have let you go. I never should have let you slip. Through my arms. [X5]
english.segment5: As the sun sets tonight. I'll hold you with all that I am. [X3]. I never should have let you go. Promise me. You'll stay with me forever. Forever. [X3]
english.segment6: Forgive me. For running so quickly to the outside. [X2]
